rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0001
rows.name:
It's been a while since I've seen a Driver and Blade
who don't belong to the Superbian Imperial Army.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0002
rows.name:
At the risk of sounding like a meddling old man,
I'll give you a few words of advice.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0003
rows.name:
A Driver's element is determined by the element
of their Blade.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0004
rows.name:
So if you have a Wind element Blade with you,
the Driver will also perform Wind element attacks.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0006
rows.name:
For example, if you attack a Water element monster
with a Fire element Blade, you'll do more damage.

rows.label: tlk41700321_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Switching Blades effectively depending on the enemy
you're fighting... that's an important thing to remember.
